title: Pixel 2 corrupted on start up
content: This more a fix than a question. I had a assistance help me with it..very helpful. Thank you Google team . But after 3 factory resets did not fix it. Took to 2 experts that fix phones and they did not want to touch it.  So I was able to do it myself . If you follow these instruction ..they do work . Use the tool platform command  and run cmd or powershell in the folder .Basically it replies update over the old one. Do data loss or settings. Recommend this  .  Here is the link https://support.google.com/pixelphone/thread/34417666?hl=en&msgid=34514669
